channel.title: f1 score on felladog
channel.description: Recent content in f1 score on felladog

item.title: ML Evaluations Score
item.description: references questions Accuracy Precision Precision = \(\frac{True Positive}{True Positive + False Positive}\) Recall Recall = \(\frac{True Positive}{True Positive + False Negative}\) F1 Score A harmonic mean between recall and precision Why ? Tries to give the lowest value between recall and precision biased to the lowest value Balances recall and precision F1 Score = \(\frac{2}{\frac{1}{Precision} + \frac{1}{Recall}}\)
